text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: That being said, let's race, Ardan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: You're serious about this, aren't you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
What a strange thing to ask. After all, I am 
the person that understands you best.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: …… Yes. More than any other in the world. I understand.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: W-wait! W-what am I supposed to be doing…!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Dober, please take the others to a location 
where they can watch us clearly.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Ardan…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Hah!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
(Alright! I was able to take the lead. At this rate, I should 
be able to expand the distance between us.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
(Nee-sama's running style is sharp. Not to mention she knows 
me better than anyone else. However… because of that, 
she underestimates my abilities.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
(So before Nee-sama can begin her attack, I will establish 
a definitive lead and make my move. I won't even give her 
a chance to react…!)

text_block_list.name: Child Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
So this is the true strength of Tracen Academy! 
Wow! They're still getting faster!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
(I've passed the halfway point! With how much distance is left, 
I should be able to maintain my lead until I've passed the goal!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Hahhhh!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Oh? Finally.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Huh!? When did she?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
(Don't tell me that Nee-sama already decided 
to make her move…!? She got me good!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Now who is the one underestimating who?

text_block_list.name: Child Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Wow, she's so cool! Ramonu finally passed her!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huh! Ramonu really is skilled!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
(I was too naïve. From the start, Nee-sama had a firm read on 
my strategy. From there, she knew I would try to take the lead.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
("Nee-sama will underestimate my abilities." 
That's the belief I relied on… Unfortunately, 
I must accept this as a humiliating defeat)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: You've become a bit presumptuous, haven't you?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
You said that "I'm the one that knows you best," but 
that would also mean the same vice-versa A race, and 
by extension, me, can turn things around just as easily.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: …… Enough. You will not see my shameful side again.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Everyone. What did you think of our running?

text_block_list.name: Child Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: You two were just the coolest!

text_block_list.name: Child Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: I was really moved! You two were very beautiful out there!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
Fufu. I hope that this moment was 
able to bring a fire to your hearts.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
That blazing heartbeat will undoubtedly 
allow you to carve your way onto the turf. 
Inescapable, like a chain. Overflowing, like love.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
When you cry out "I want to run!" earnestly from 
the heart and make your choice, just know that 
I will be here waiting for you.

text_block_list.name: Child Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me! I want to learn how to run from Ms. Mejiro Ramonu! 
I want to become as fast as you one day!

text_block_list.name: Child Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Me too, me too! I want to run just like the three of you!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Oh my. Well, this was bound to happen. Please give it your all.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl Children
text_block_list.text:
Yayyyy～! 
Yeyyyy…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
Anyways… Hmmm… Oh well, I'm sure if you 
enjoy running, you'll get faster.

text_block_list.name: Child Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Y-You're not gonna say anything else…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
I'll leave the rest to Ardan and Dober 
to teach you more properly. How's that?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
In that case, let us continue with teaching you proper form. 
Let's practice together. Ready, Dober?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: M-me!? Um, sure…!

text_block_list.name: Chaperone
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much for your time today! Now everyone, 
please make sure you thank the ladies from Tracen Academy 
who helped us out!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl Children
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: …… Well, I suppose it is time to give "that" to Rudolf.

text_block_list.name: Camera-holding Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Understood! I'll make sure it is delivered as soon as possible!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Thank you. Good work today, you two.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
…… And she's gone. She really is amazing. Just having 
her in the room changes the atmosphere completely.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Indeed… And she's purer than anyone.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Pure……?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
The way she runs always carries "a love for the race itself". 
That is her pure sparkle that nobody could take from her 
if they tried.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Or at least that's what I believe as her younger sister. 
I'm sure the reason she wanted to put on such a show 
in front of the children was for the same reason.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh. I'm sure that one day it will come. The brilliant place that I 
cannot help but fall in love with. When it does, I will be the one 
to guide the untapped potential of the unhatched eggs.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
With that fiery light in your hearts, please chase after it. 
Take it and create the ultimate race with your own hands.
